attributes.action: Close down Huntingdon Life Sciences now
attributes.additional_details: Home Office - Remove its Licence. DBIS - Stop providing it with free banking and insurance services at the taxpayers' expense.As Europe's largest animal-testing lab, it must be implicated in the 197 000 deaths caused by adverse drug reactions caused by animal-tested drugs which happen in Europe every year ( EC estimate 2008).It is quite simply the most evil thing in Britain today. Look at the pictures of the animals.
